name: Albert Mangwea
description: '''Albert Keneth Mangweha''' (November 16, 1982 - May 28, 2013) who used aliases; '''Ngwair''', '''Mangwea''', '''Mangwair''', and '''Ngwea''' was a [[Tanzanian hip hop]] artist predominantly known for his [[Freestyle music|freestyle]] [[Punch line|punchlines]] and [[hardcore rap]] style.
